summary: Stress test CI workflow exits with timeout error (exit code 124). The worker fails to pick up new tasks, possibly related to Docker Compose setup or artifact loss during reruns.
userImpact: CI stress tests fail intermittently, preventing validation of SDK stability under load.
rootCause: Worker not picking up new tasks, potentially due to Docker Compose setup or lost artifacts during test reruns
resolutionDetails: Issue was resolved at some point, though exact cause and fix are not documented in the discussion
keyQuote: 124 looks due to timeout. I think this is related to #804 where for some reason the worker isn't picking up new tasks.
